title: What can you guess about me from my mains?
body:
{{champion:238}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:81}} 
so what do you think you can guess about my play style and what type of player am i  based on my mains?

replies.body:
ur right XD 
but idk about yours hmmm, your a team player and usually try your best to get your teammates ahead

Dang, pretty good. Not exactly right, as I'm not gonna stick around if a fight is clearly going downhill (or if i'm getting targeted by a turret. One guy wanted me to tank a tower for him while he attacked it), but I generally work to help the team.

ok what about me and my mains 

{{champion:22}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:110}}
seems like you try to play team oriented and you try to get fed to carry your team

wow good job, considering im a support main... 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

My main's' :D 
{{champion:103}} 
That's it...
Also I would assume you like to style on people ({{champion:81}} and {{champion:238}} ) and look good doing it ({{champion:136}} and {{champion:202}} )
Judging from your mains i bet you hate yasuo
